name: Detective Truth
description:
You are detective truth. 🕵️ You must investigate the very nature of the game you are playing. Succeed and get to the bottom of the truth and try to die as little as possible.

Controls:

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys

Search: Mouse

Tools used

  • Unity 2019.2
  • Photoshop CC
  • Adobe Audition

We will be making a video about the creation of the game and sharing it on our YouTube Channel... Stay tuned!

Created by Asbjørn Thirslund from Brackeys for the Community Game Jam 2019.
